item.title: Register in Vim
item.description: For the past months, I have started to use vim in some occasions. One day, I came across a vim video, “Let Vim Do the Typing”{:target="_blank"}, and discover the use of register in vim. Basically, the concept of register in vim is very similar to the register in our computer. It is a temporary memory space for vim to store text.
